channel.title: Help with NPC's and store making
channel.description: Hello i just made a runescape private server and it runs on Batmanscape's source. I was wondering how to make stores like with npcs that have items to trade. first, how do i make a NPC stay permanent without it being killed or deleted and that says things like "get your magic items here!" can anyone help???

item.title: Help with NPC's and store making
item.dc:creator: @freakinlost freakinlost
item.description:
@freakinlost wrote:

[quote=“b b0yz 4, post:2, topic:341069”]Ok, well first of I need to look over the server files to refresh my memory on what to do.

I can’t help you with the NPC permanent thing, but I might be able to help you with putting NPCs in and making them say stuff. And also making the store. Let me look over the files to see what you do first.[/quote]
…

add this in client.java

} else if (NPCID == npc id) PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 1; // Aubury Magic Shop

then go into atouspawn.cfg and add this

spawn = npc	coordY	coordX	0	0	0	0	0	1	bob

that is for adding an npc wher you want it
idc if you already knew that

then go into shops.cfg

shop = 1	shopname				2	2	itemid	amount	//add more items if needed

see that 1 its the wanneshop code i gave which opens the shop interface
this should of solved your problems pretty easy

edit: oh make sure nothing else has the same wanneshop number or everything will clash

so switch wanneshop = 1 to 2 or higher if needed

Read full topic
item.source: Help with NPC's and store making

item.description:
@b_b0yz_4 wrote:

Ok, well first of I need to look over the server files to refresh my memory on what to do.

I can’t help you with the NPC permanent thing, but I might be able to help you with putting NPCs in and making them say stuff. And also making the store. Let me look over the files to see what you do first.
